member.name: FINDEX_INFO_LEVELS
member.summary: Defines values that are used with the function to specify the information level of the returned data.

member.name: FINDEX_INFO_LEVELS.FindExInfoStandard
member.summary: The function retrieves a standard set of attribute information. The data is returned in a structure.

summary.para: The function does not query the short file name, improving overall enumeration speed. The data is returned in a structure, and the cAlternateFileNamemember is always a NULL string.
Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported until Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7.

member.name: FINDEX_INFO_LEVELS.FindExInfoMaxInfoLevel
member.summary: This value is used for validation. Supported values are less than this value.
